attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today 18.5 million + disabled people are not provided for properly because all organisations in the UK and they will not meet disability laws, over Disabled Accessible Format / languages Systems & Disability Assistive Technology Systems.
We are asking the British Government and the Prime Minister, to bring in new Disabled laws to protect the rights of disabled people over DATS and DAFS.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
